Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Prelude of Light#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the path to #Barinade#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #a Small Key#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #a Red Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Shield#.
